attributes.action: land of hope and glory again
attributes.additional_details:
To much of our land is not being used, farmers and landowners being paid not to use it, would'nt it be great if we could get all these bored no hope youngsters back on to the land, hedge laying, physically dealing with crops, woodland etc,
Computerisation has removed so many physical jobs away from society we need to bring some back, so youngsters have a feeling of self worth, and let's face it you can't beat a good manual days work to feel good !!!!
